8800.name: Naga Storm - Focus
8800.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Critical Rate by 67. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Focus

8801.name: Naga Storm - Critical Damage
8801.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases P. Atk. by 200 on a critical attack. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Critical Damage

8802.name: Naga Storm - Back Blow
8802.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Critical Rate by 37 when attacking a target from behind. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Back Blow

8803.name: Tiphon's Spear - Critical Stun
8803.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Has a 25% chance of stunning a target during a critical attack. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: PvP Damage

8804.name: Tiphon's Spear - Towering Blow
8804.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases the attack range. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: PvP Damage

8805.name: Tiphon's Spear - Wild Blow
8805.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases the possibility of broadening the angle of attack. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: PvP Damage

8806.name: Shyeed's Bow - Cheap Shot
8806.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Adds a 30% chance of decreasing MP consumption by 1 on a general attack. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: PvP Damage

8807.name: Shyeed's Bow - Focus
8807.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Critical by 61. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Focus

8808.name: Shyeed's Bow - Quick Recovery
8808.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Decreases re-use delay by about 17%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: PvP Damage

8809.name: Sobekk's Hurricane - Rsk. Haste
8809.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Atk. Spd. by 11% when HP drops to 60% or lower. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Rsk. Haste

8810.name: Sobekk's Hurricane - Haste
8810.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Atk. Spd. by about 6%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Haste

8811.name: Sobekk's Hurricane - Critical Drain
8811.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases the possibility of absorbing 14 HP on a critical attack. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: PvP Damage

8812.name: Themis' Tongue - Mana Up
8812.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max MP by 30%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Mana Up

8813.name: Themis' Tongue - Mental Shield
8813.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Has a 50% chance of casting Mental Shield when using a magic skill on the target. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: PvP Damage

8814.name: Themis' Tongue - Magic Focus
8814.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Has a 20% chance of casting Focus when using a magic skill on the target. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: PvP Damage

8815.name: Cabrio's Hand - Conversion
8815.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max MP by 60% and decreases Max HP by 40%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Conversion

8816.name: Cabrio's Hand - Mana Up
8816.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max MP by 30%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Mana Up

8817.name: Cabrio's Hand - Magic Silence
8817.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Has a 10% chance of casting Silence when using a magic skill on the target. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: PvP Damage

8818.name: Daimon Crystal - Mana Up
8818.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max MP by 30%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Mana Up

8819.name: Daimon Crystal - Acumen
8819.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Casting Spd. by 15%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Acumen

8820.name: Daimon Crystal - Mental Shield
8820.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Has a 50% chance of casting Mental Shield when using a magic skill on the target. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: PvP Damage

8868.name: Ziggo's Gemstone
8868.description: This bright, shiny gemstone looks as though it would fetch a good price if you sold it at the shop.

8869.name: Shadow Item Exchange Coupon (D-Grade)
8869.description: This exchange coupon allows you to obtain a D-Grade Shadow Item. Take it to a Grand Master for your occupation to exchange it for a shadow item.

8870.name: Shadow Item Exchange Coupon (C-Grade)
8870.description: This exchange coupon allows you to obtain a C-Grade Shadow Item. Take it to a Grand Master for your occupation to exchange it for a shadow item.

8871.name: Strategy Guide
8871.description: This book contains information about the methods and strategies used to lead a Command Channel. Use it to create a Command Channel.

8872.name: Flash Gunpowder
8872.description: This specially processed gunpowder doesn't create smoke. It is consumed while using the swoop cannon skill.

8873.name: Phoenix Blood
8873.description: A consumption item for using Soul of the Phoenix.

8874.name: Einhasad's Holy Water
8874.description: A consumption item for using Cleanse or Salvation.

8875.name: Battle Symbol
8875.description: A consumption item for using the skill learned with the Ancient Tactical Manual.

8876.name: Magic Symbol
8876.description: A consumption item for using the skill learned with the ancient spellbook.

8877.name: Spellbook: Soul of the Phoenix
8877.description: Spellbook needed to learn Soul of the Phoenix. Used by a Phoenix Knight.

8878.name: Spellbook: Summon Feline King

8890.name: Spellbook: Summon Attractive Cubic
8890.description: Spellbook needed to learn Summon Attractive Cubic. Used by a Temple Knight. Required level: 62

8891.name: Spellbook: Aura Flash
8891.description: Spellbook needed to learn Aura Flash. Used by a Sorcerer, Spellsinger, and Spellhowler. Required level: 58

8892.name: Ancient Tactical Manual: Symbol of Defence
8892.description: Ancient Tactical Manual needed to master the Symbol of Defence. Can be used by a Phoenix Knight, Hell Knight, Eva's Templar, and Shillien Templar.

8893.name: Ancient Tactical Manual: Symbol of Noise
8893.description: Ancient Tactical Manual needed to master the Symbol of Noise. Can be used by a Sword Muse and Spectral Dancer.

8894.name: Ancient Tactical Manual: Symbol of Resistance
8894.description: Ancient Tactical Manual needed to master the Symbol of Resistance. Can be used by a Titan and Fortune Seeker.

8895.name: Ancient Tactical Manual: Symbol of Honor
8895.description: Ancient Tactical Manual needed to master the Symbol of Honor. Can be used by a Dreadnought and Maestro.

8896.name: Ancient Tactical Manual: Symbol of Energy
8896.description: Ancient Tactical Manual needed to master the Symbol of Energy. Can be used by a Duelist and Grand Khavatari.

8897.name: Ancient Tactical Manual: Symbol of the Sniper
8897.description: Ancient Tactical Manual needed to master the Symbol of the Sniper. Can be used by a Sagittarius, Ghost Sentinel, and Moonlight Sentinel.

8898.name: Ancient Tactical Manual: Symbol of the Assassin
8898.description: Ancient Tactical Manual needed to master the Symbol of Assassin. Can be used by an Adventurer and a Windrider.

8899.name: Ancient Spellbook: Volcano
8899.description: Ancient Spellbook needed to learn Volcano. Can be used by an Archmage.
